title: Microsoft explorapedia: the world of nature (PC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Children's encyclopedias and dictionaries
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental education
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
description: A wonderful multimedia exploration of the animal kingdom designed for children in primary school. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC with 486SX or higher processor; 4 MB or memory (8 MB recommended); at least 8MB of available hard-disk space; double-speed DC-ROM drive, audi board, and 256 colour Super VGA monitor; MS-DOS Windows operating system version 3.1 or later;
